content:
Sure, here are some unconventional and edgy attractions in Savannah that may interest you:

1. The House of Mata Hari - This interactive performance art experience immerses guests in the world of Mata Hari, a famous exotic dancer and spy from the early 20th century. Expect music, dancing, and plenty of intrigue.

2. The Savannah Bicycle Campaign - Rent a bike and explore the city on your own with the help of the Savannah Bicycle Campaign, an organization that promotes cycling as a sustainable and healthy way to get around.

3. The Lucas Theatre for the Arts - This beautifully restored theater hosts a variety of live performances, from theater and dance to music and comedy.

4. Art Rise Savannah - This nonprofit organization is dedicated to promoting the arts in Savannah, and hosts a variety of events and exhibitions featuring local artists and performers.

5. Graveface Records & Curiosities - Part record store, part oddities shop, Graveface Records & Curiosities offers a unique shopping experience for music and horror fans alike.

6. The Forsyth Farmers' Market - For a taste of the local food scene that's a bit more unconventional, check out the Forsyth Farmers' Market, where you can sample fresh produce, baked goods, and other treats from local vendors.

7. The Midnight Garden Ride - Once a year, Savannah hosts a nighttime bike ride through the city, complete with live music, food trucks, and plenty of illuminated decorations. It's a great way to experience the city from a new perspective.
